sample.description: Fan-shaped body of a 5 day-old adult male Drosophila (Genome type: iso Canton S G1 x w1118 iso 5905).
sample.protocol: Chemical Fixation, ORTO-Lead-EPTA staining via progressive lowering of temperature and low temperature staining (PLT-LTS) heavy metal enhancement protocol.
sample.contributions: Sample provided by Zhiyuan Lu (HHMI/Janelia), prepared, imaged and post-processed by Song Pang (HHMI/Janelia), with post-processing by C. Shan Xu (HHMI/Janelia).

views.name: Default view
views.description: The default view of the data.

views.name: Dense-core vesicles (DCVs)
views.description: Dense-core vesicles (DCVs) of different sizes in fan-shaped body of a five-day-old adult Drosophilabrain, as described in Fig. 4h of Xu et al. 2020c.

views.name: Multiple synaptic sites (T-bars)
views.description: Multiple synaptic sites (T-bars) viewed from the side in fan-shaped body of a five-day-old adult Drosophilabrain, as described in Fig. 4i of Xu et al. 2020c.

views.name: Presynaptic sites (T-bars)
views.description: A presynaptic T-bar viewed from the top in fan-shaped body of a five-day-old adult Drosophilabrain, as described in Fig. 4j of Xu et al. 2020c.

views.name: Microtubules
views.description: A longitudinal-section view of microtubules in fan-shaped body of a five-day-old adult Drosophilabrain, as described in Fig. 4k of Xu et al. 2020c.

views.name: Microtubule arrays
views.description: A cross-section view of microtubule arrays in fan-shaped body of a five-day-old adult Drosophilabrain, as described in Fig. 4l of Xu et al. 2020c.
